languages.text: В задумчивой растерянности Ирлиэт наблюдает, как крошечное эльдарское судно теряется среди удаляющихся астероидов и бесчисленных звезд. С печалью в сердце она касается камня душ на груди, прикрывает глаза и мысленно прощается с сородичами, коих вскоре ждет неизбежная смерть.

traits.locale_text: В задумчивой растерянности Ирлиэт наблюдает, как крошечный эльдарский корабль теряется среди удаляющихся астероидов и бесчисленных звезд. С печалью в сердце она прощается с сородичами, коих вскоре ждет неизбежная смерть.

languages.text: Yrliet distractedly watches as the tiny Aeldari voidship disappears amid the shrinking asteroids and countless stars. With sorrow in her heart, she touches the spirit stone on her chest, closes her eyes, and bids a silent goodbye to her kin, who are left alone, inevitably doomed.
languages.original_text: В задумчивой растерянности Ирлиэт наблюдает, как крошечное эльдарское судно теряется среди удаляющихся астероидов и бесчисленных звезд. С печалью в сердце она касается камня душ на груди, прикрывает глаза и мысленно прощается с сородичами, коих вскоре ждет неизбежная смерть.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet distractedly watches as the tiny Aeldari voidship disappears amid the shrinking asteroids and countless stars. She utters a sorrowful goodbye to her kin, who are left alone to their inevitable doom.

Yrliet distractedly watches as the tiny Aeldari voidship disappears amid the shrinking asteroids and countless stars. With sorrow in her heart, she touches the spirit stone on her chest, closes her eyes, and bids a silent goodbye to her kin, who are left alone, inevitably doomed.

Yrliet distractedly watches as the tiny Aeldari voidship disappears amid the shrinking asteroids and countless stars. With sorrow in her heart, she touches the spirit stone on her chest, closes her eyes, and bids a silent goodbye to her kin, who are left alone, inevitably doomed.

Yrliet distractedly watches as the tiny Aeldari voidship disappears amid the shrinking asteroids and countless stars. With sorrow in her heart, she touches the spirit stone on her chest, closes her eyes, and bids a silent goodbye to her kin, who are left alone, inevitably doomed.

languages.text: Yrliet regarde distraitement le vaisseau aeldari disparaître parmi les astéroïdes et les innombrables étoiles qui rapetissent de plus en plus. Le cœur en peine, elle touche la pierre-esprit sur sa poitrine, ferme les yeux et dit adieu en silence aux membres de son peuple, qui se retrouvent seuls et condamnés.
languages.original_text: Yrliet distractedly watches as the tiny Aeldari voidship disappears amid the shrinking asteroids and countless stars. With sorrow in her heart, she touches the spirit stone on her chest, closes her eyes, and bids a silent goodbye to her kin, who are left alone, inevitably doomed.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet regarde distraitement le vaisseau aeldari disparaître parmi les astéroïdes et les innombrables étoiles qui rapetissent de plus en plus. Le cœur en peine, elle touche la pierre-esprit sur sa poitrine, ferme les yeux et dit adieu en silence aux membres de son peuple, qui se retrouvent seuls et condamnés.

languages.text: アエルダリのヴォイドシップが、小さくなっていく小惑星と無数の星々の中に消えていくのを、ユリエットはぼんやりと眺めていた。悲しみを胸に秘めながら、彼女は胸の魂縛石に触れ、目を閉じ、一人残され、避けられない運命にあるキンに静かな別れを告げた。
languages.original_text: Yrliet distractedly watches as the tiny Aeldari voidship disappears amid the shrinking asteroids and countless stars. With sorrow in her heart, she touches the spirit stone on her chest, closes her eyes, and bids a silent goodbye to her kin, who are left alone, inevitably doomed.

traits.locale_text: アエルダリのヴォイドシップが、小さくなっていく小惑星と無数の星々の中に消えていくのを、ユリエットはぼんやりと眺めていた。悲しみを胸に秘めながら、彼女は胸の魂縛石に触れ、目を閉じ、一人残され、避けられない運命にあるキンに静かな別れを告げた。

languages.text: 伊莉耶特心烦意乱地看着那艘小小的艾达灵族飞船，静静地消失在不断缩小的小行星带与群星之间。她怀着悲痛的心情，触摸着胸前的灵魂石，闭上眼睛，无声地告别了她的亲人。那些人被遗弃在小行星带离，注定难逃一劫。
languages.original_text: Yrliet distractedly watches as the tiny Aeldari voidship disappears amid the shrinking asteroids and countless stars. With sorrow in her heart, she touches the spirit stone on her chest, closes her eyes, and bids a silent goodbye to her kin, who are left alone, inevitably doomed.

traits.locale_text: 伊莉耶特心烦意乱地看着那艘小小的艾达灵族飞船，静静地消失在不断缩小的小行星带与群星之间。她怀着悲痛的心情，触摸着胸前的灵魂石，闭上眼睛，无声地告别了她的亲人。那些人被遗弃在小行星带离，注定难逃一劫。

languages.text: Yrliet observa distraída cómo la pequeña nave del vacío Aeldari desaparece entre los asteroides cada vez más pequeños y las incontables estrellas. Con dolor en el corazón, toca la joya espiritual que lleva en el pecho, cierra los ojos y se despide en silencio de los suyos, que se quedan solos, condenados.
languages.original_text: Yrliet distractedly watches as the tiny Aeldari voidship disappears amid the shrinking asteroids and countless stars. With sorrow in her heart, she touches the spirit stone on her chest, closes her eyes, and bids a silent goodbye to her kin, who are left alone, inevitably doomed.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet observa distraída cómo la pequeña nave del vacío Aeldari desaparece entre los asteroides cada vez más pequeños y las incontables estrellas. Con dolor en el corazón, toca la joya espiritual que lleva en el pecho, cierra los ojos y se despide en silencio de los suyos, que se quedan solos, condenados.

languages.text: Yrliet sieht abgelenkt zu, wie das winzige Aeldari-Raumschiff zwischen den schrumpfenden Asteroiden und unzähligen Sternen verschwindet. Mit Trauer im Herzen berührt sie den Seelenstein auf ihrer Brust, schließt die Augen und verabschiedet sich stumm von ihren Verwandten, die allein gelassen werden, unweigerlich dem Untergang geweiht.
languages.original_text: Yrliet distractedly watches as the tiny Aeldari voidship disappears amid the shrinking asteroids and countless stars. With sorrow in her heart, she touches the spirit stone on her chest, closes her eyes, and bids a silent goodbye to her kin, who are left alone, inevitably doomed.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet sieht abgelenkt zu, wie das winzige Aeldari-Raumschiff zwischen den schrumpfenden Asteroiden und unzähligen Sternen verschwindet. Mit Trauer im Herzen berührt sie den Seelenstein auf ihrer Brust, schließt die Augen und verabschiedet sich stumm von ihren Verwandten, die allein gelassen werden, unweigerlich dem Untergang geweiht.

languages.text: Minik Aeldari uçsuz gemisi, ufalan asteroitler ve sayısız yıldız arasında gözden kaybolurken Yrliet telaşla izliyor. Gönlünde hüzünle göğsündeki ruh taşına dokunup gözlerini yumarak yapayalnız bırakılıp kaderlerine terk edilen soydaşlarına sessizce veda ediyor.
languages.original_text: Yrliet distractedly watches as the tiny Aeldari voidship disappears amid the shrinking asteroids and countless stars. With sorrow in her heart, she touches the spirit stone on her chest, closes her eyes, and bids a silent goodbye to her kin, who are left alone, inevitably doomed.
